page.title: 09HOUSING IN WENHAM AND RAYDON
page.content: There is a sizeable council house estate in Church Close at Great Wenham. A barn at Lodge Farm is being converted into a private dwelling.Manor Farmhouse is now vacant and on the market as a private residence in much need of restoration.The Cart Lodge owned by Giles Langton of Wenham Grange Farm has been surveyed by Suffolk Buildings Recording Society and plans lodged with the National Historic Buildings Comission. When the school closed at Raydon the community raised money to buy half the building for use as a community centre. The other half was sold to be converted into a private dwelling.The playing field land,lent to the school by local farmer Mr.Dunningham has been sold and a private dwelling is now in the process of being built upon it.
